description.p: The NVIDIA Accelerated Linux Graphics Driver brings accelerated 2D functionality and high-performance OpenGL support to Linux with the use of NVIDIA graphics processing units.

These drivers provide optimized hardware acceleration for OpenGL and X applications and support GeForce 8 series and newer NVIDIA GPU products. GeForce5 and below are NOT supported by this release. The NVIDIA graphics driver uses a Unified Driver Architecture: the single graphics driver supports all modern NVIDIA GPUs.
